name: Dayflow Illustrations
description:
A collection inspired by people, cats, coffee, colors, and positivity! Just the small things that make our daily lives happier and better :)


All the illustrations in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can customize them however you want! Follow these steps to learn how.


It works like building blocks made of vector arms, legs, and emotions. Mix elements to create different characters and scenes.


Install the Blush plugin so you can customize everything.


Art by Pau Barbaro
